amendment.description: To require the President's fiscal year 2006 budget to include an amount sufficient for funding a certain level of maritime patrol capability.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3648 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3648 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S9208-9209; text: CR S9209) To require the President's fiscal year 2006 budget to include an amount sufficient for funding a certain level of maritime patrol capability.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3648 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3648 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Shelby.
